statements: UPDATE user_locations SET location = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(2 3)') WHERE user_id = 1;

UPDATE user_locations SET location = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(1 1)') WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_locations SET location = ST_Transform(ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePoint(2, 2), 4326), 3857) WHERE user_id = 2;
